action.text: Workflow **Expert Plan tickets tag as urgent** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi Grant,

Just a quick update on this.

It was a syncing issue on the backend - we've reconnected the integration in Google Business Profile, and everything is now working as expected.

You should now see Michelle Wright's review in the Reputation tab + the correct number of reviews.


Thanks for your patience while we sorted it out.

Cheers,
Andy

action.text: Workflow **Assign Expert Plan (AC - Apr 16)** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi @andy,

Upon investigating, I think we can solve this by re integrating team@smartreviews.com.au. It seems that lance has access to this account, so we are waiting on him.

Hi Grant,

Thanks for flagging this. We've reviewed the Reputation section and noticed the same discrepancy you mentioned:


  1. Google currently shows 32 reviews, while the Reputation dashboard is only displaying 31 reviews
  2. Michelle Wright's review is the one missing from the Reputation tab
  3. She is in the CRM under the Rockhampton & Central QLD account and her review activity lines up with the Google review timing (July 15)

Looping in support@wolfiq.com.au to investigate why this review isn't syncing to the Reputation dashboard.

This appears to be a syncing issue rather than anything related to CRM-triggered reviews.

We'll come back to you as soon as we have an update.
Thanks,
Andy

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: I'm in the reputation - review section and I cant see it. I've checked our reviews via google maps and there isn't a response from us either. Can I grab someone for a quick zoom chat to ensure I'm going to the right section please?

Hi Grant,

We've double-checked Michelle Wright's record and can confirm she's in the CRM under the Rockhampton & Central QLD account.


Her review activity lines up with the Google review timing - she clicked the review funnel link on July 15, and the review was posted shortly after.


There are three Trueline accounts in the system (Rockhampton & Central QLD, Brisbane, and Victoria), so it's worth confirming we're all looking at the same account view.

Thanks,
Andy
